statements: SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 5 ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, registration_date FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY registration_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 5 ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id ASC, username DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS user_count FROM users GROUP BY registration_date HAVING user_count > 3;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_authentication WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, password_hash FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id > 100;
SELECT * FROM account_details ORDER BY date_joined DESC;
SELECT account_id, email FROM account_details WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM user_authentication WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, password_hash FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM account_details ORDER BY date_joined DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_authentication JOIN account_details ON user_authentication.user_id = account_details.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT account_id, account_type FROM user_accounts WHERE wallet_balance > 1000;
SELECT session_id, user_id, login_time FROM sessions WHERE logout_time IS NULL ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC, username ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY username;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT u.username, ua.account_type, ua.wallet_balance FROM users u JOIN user_accounts ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id WHERE ua.wallet_balance >= 1000 ORDER BY u.username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email, created_at FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT name, level, class FROM characters WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT full_name, age, country, bio FROM profiles WHERE user_id = 3 AND age > 18;
SELECT item_id, name, type, quantity FROM items WHERE character_id = 4 AND quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com'
SELECT users.username, characters.name FROM users JOIN characters ON users.user_id = characters.user_id
SELECT users.username, profiles.full_name, characters.name FROM users JOIN profiles ON users.user_id = profiles.user_id JOIN characters ON users.user_id = characters.user_id
SELECT characters.name, items.name, items.quantity FROM characters JOIN items ON characters.character_id = items.character_id
SELECT * FROM User_Authentication ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, password FROM User_Authentication WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT account_id, email FROM Account_Details WHERE account_type = 'Premium';
SELECT * FROM Game_Profiles WHERE user_id = 10 AND level > 20;
SELECT item_name, price FROM Purchases WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT username, password FROM User_Authentication WHERE username LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT account_id, email FROM Account_Details WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT profile_id, game_name, level FROM Game_Profiles ORDER BY level DESC, game_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, item_name, price FROM Purchases WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
